Plot: An infamous gossip columnist is fatally stabbed in the back. The story circles a Yankees pitcher, a pop star, and an actor's apparently accidental overdose. Nikki Heat and hotshot reporter Jameson Rook trade barbs and innuendos while on the trail of a murderer.
Characters: Nikki Heat, Jameson Rook, Lauren Parry
Setting: New York City, New York (United States)
